From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: The **service finger** command has been replaced by the **ip finger** command. However, the **service finge**r and **no service finger** commands continue to function to maintain backward compatibility with older versions of CiscoÂ IOS software. Support for this command may be removed in a future release. See the description of the **ip finger** command for more information.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.
